headerContent.title: Experience The Best
headerContent.paragraph: Taking Place in Jeddah Saudi Arabia

about.title: A Game of Skill And Speed
about.paragraph: Get Your Chance to Watch these talented players.

aboutGame.title: About
aboutGame.paragraph: The game of billiards is played on a rectangular table covered with a green cloth, or baize, with six pockets, one at each corner and one in the middle of each long side. A full-size table is 12 feet (3.7 m) long and 6 feet (1.8 m) wide.
